regularSubmissionAgreement.arrangementAndNamingScheme: Department of Widget Science naming scheme at Widget_namingscheme.doc
regularSubmissionAgreement.retentionPeriod: Retain Close of Grant Project + 7 Years, then confidentially destroy. Director of the Archive and Professor John Johnson, Department of Widget Science review records before executing disposition.
regularSubmissionAgreement.sipCreationAndTransfer: Transfer 100 image files as tifs along with inventory and descriptive metadata; place files in electronic dropbox at http://foo
regularSubmissionAgreement.sipToAip: Maintain tifs, create full and thumbnail datastreams
regularSubmissionAgreement.respectDeFonds: UA041 Department of Widget Science records
